channel.description: Recent content in Nginx on devopstales

item.title: Migrating from NGINX Ingress Controller to HAProxy: A Step-by-Step Guide
item.description: With Ingress NGINX retiring in March 2026, learn how to migrate to HAProxy Kubernetes Ingress Controller with practical examples, annotation mappings, and zero-downtime strategies.
